original_title: 25 Years Louder Than Hell - The W:O:A Documentary
overview: Documentary about the Wacken Open Air heavy metal music festival. Featuring interviews with fans, musicians and the event's organisers, the programme traces the history of the festival and documents its community since its debut outing in 1990 in the small German village of Wacken.
title: 25 Years Louder Than Hell - The W:O:A Documentary
